title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1542/1999 of 14 July 1999 fixing the actual production of olive oil and the unit amount of production aid for the 1997/98 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1542/1999
of 14 July 1999
fixing the actual production of olive oil and the unit amount of production aid for the 1997/98 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1997/98 olive oil marketing year:
- the quantity actually produced in respect of which entitlement to the production aid has been recognised is 2394291 tonnes,
- the unit amount of the production aid shall be EUR 80,17 per 100 kilograms.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
